commit message:
Merge tag '1.0.63' into develop

1.0.63
Dark theme beginning. Some changes from @aelmahmoudy pull request #374
Recent chats background set in theme.
Dark theme: contact list account, groups, active chats colors.
Chat balloons colored according to Theme.
Version 1.0.64 (code 237)
Account list: SwitchCompat used.
AccountInfoEditorFragment: birth date text color corrected.
Switch preference compat for Account Editor.
Theme.AppCompat.Light.DarkActionBar used as Light theme.
Contact list colors included in Themes and corrected for dark mode.
Contact list: client icons replaced by vector xml's and color adjusted through ting for both themes.
Contact list: large client icon color changed for both themes, smal client icon uses alpha for both themes.
Version 1.0.65 (code 238)
Contact list: MUC indicator icons turned to vector and tinted according to theme.
Expander indicator replaced by vector ones.
'Show offline' icon replaced by vector XMLs.
Contact list: client icon moved backward.
Contact dialog heading text color corrected.
RosterManagers: list of contacts  do not modified to avoid concurrent modification exception.
Version 1.0.66 (code 239)
Theme changes and fixes.
Changes in presence processing: smack roster presence used. PresenceManager do not store presences anymore.
Version 1.0.67 (code 240)
Dark theme main account colors correction
Chat background and input field colors corrected.
Roster refactored to avoid null pointer exceptions.
Active chats and outgoing messages colors corrected.
Version 1.0.68 (code 241)
Dark theme status bar colors changed.
AccountPainter: account text color added.
Colorful text corrected in dialogs
Only light and dark themes left in settings. Light is default one.
Chat scroll indicators use shape to draw circles.
Dark theme colors changed.
Version 1.0.69 (code 242)
Contact list account group and group colors corrected.
Navigation drawer color changed.
Chat: several input buttons replaced by vectors, color changed, background style changed.
Roster reload request if needed added.
Chat input buttons color added to theme.
Send button replaced by vector and colored programmatically.
ColorManager: getThemeColor method added.
Strange bug with background color for some Android 4.x fixed for chat input field and contact list background.
Chat: input buttons align corrected.
Version 1.0.70 (code 243)
PresenceManager: subscription fixed.
Merge branch 'feature/dark_theme' into develop
Translations updated.
Fix for bright app bar in dark theme with all accounts disabled.
Conference filter input background color fixed.
First version of dark chat background and fix it's display.
Contact list subgroup color for Blue Grey changed.
Version 1.0.71 (code 244)
new package ui/color, AccountPainter moved to ColorManager.
Forgotten dark chat background pattern added.
Background color bugs fixed.
Special color array for send button.
Special color for active chat large client icon.
DarkThemeIntroduceDialog added.
Russian translation updated.
Version 1.0.72 (code 245)
Merge branch 'release/1.0.72'
